mapper.select: SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE phone = #{phone} LIMIT 1
SELECT account_id AS accountId, username, password, phone, role FROM accounts WHERE account_id = #{accountId}
SELECT account_id AS accountId, username, password, phone, role FROM accounts WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accounts (account_id, username, password, phone, role) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{role})
